revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Glimwood Tangle |image = [[File:Glimwood Tangle.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Glimwood Tangle. |tokens = 1,680,000 |location = North of Stow-on-Side }}
<!--T:2--> '''Glimwood Tangle''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 23,764,848 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Shiinotic.png|40px]] Shiinotic || rowspan=2| [[File:Rail Staff.png|40px]] Rail Staff Robert || rowspan=2| [[File:Ninetales.png|40px]] Ninetales |- | [[File:Galarian Ponyta.png|40px]] Galarian Ponyta |- | [[File:Sinistea.png|40px]] Sinistea || rowspan=2| [[File:Cook.png|40px]] Cook Derek || rowspan=2| [[File:Milcery.png|40px]] Milcery, [[File:Sinistea.png|40px]] Sinistea, [[File:Shiinotic.png|40px]] Shiinotic |- | [[File:Phantump.png|40px]] Phantump |- | [[File:Swirlix.png|40px]] Swirlix || rowspan=2| [[File:Madame.png|40px]] Madame Judy || rowspan=2| [[File:Indeedee (Male).png|40px]] Indeedee (Male), [[File:Indeedee (Female).png|40px]] Indeedee (Female) |- | [[File:Spritzee.png|40px]] Spritzee |- | [[File:Passimian.png|40px]] Passimian || rowspan=3| [[File:Beauty (trainer).png|40px]] Beauty Jacqueline || rowspan=3| [[File:Kirlia.png|40px]] Kirlia |- | [[File:Oranguru.png|40px]] Oranguru |- | [[File:Impidimp.png|40px]] Impidimp |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !!
